title: Dangling Database Cursor (&#x27;Cursor Injection&#x27;)
overview: For example, an improper dangling cursor could arise from unhandled exceptions. The impact of the issue depends on the cursor&#x27;s role, but SQL injection attacks are commonly possible.
remediation: ::PHASE:Implementation:STRATEGY::EFFECTIVENESS::DESCRIPTION:Close cursors immediately after access to them is complete. Ensure that you close cursors if exceptions occur.::
